snippet: Andrew Bailey will have an operation on his right thumb, leaving Red Sox Manager Bobby Valentine scrambling to fill a big hole in his team’s bullpen.
lead_paragraph: Andrew Bailey will have an operation on his right thumb, leaving Red Sox Manager Bobby Valentine scrambling to fill a big hole in his team’s bullpen.

headline.seo: Andrew Bailey, New Red Sox Closer, Needs Surgery
headline.main: New Red Sox Closer Needs Surgery
headline.print_headline: New Red Sox Closer Needs Surgery
